function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Narratives against mask-wearing and vaccination during the Covid-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increase in the spread of contagious diseases, potential loss of lives","Mitigation":"Public health education, enforcement of mask-wearing and vaccination policies","Technologies":"Health communication tools, vaccination tracking systems","People":"General public, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Deleterious health consequences of thermal comfort being artificially maintained in privatised air-conditioned home spaces","Impact":"Risk of health issues due to lack of public or collective infrastructures for shade, water, and rest","Mitigation":"Investment in public infrastructure, promotion of outdoor activities and communal spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, public infrastructure development","People":"Residents, particularly those in urban areas","Owner":"Local governments, urban planners"},{"Description":"Regulatory failures leading to loss of life, as seen in the Grenfell Fire incident","Impact":"Loss of life, property damage, public safety concerns","Mitigation":"Improvements in building regulations, enforcement of fire safety standards, consumer protection policies","Technologies":"Building safety inspection tools, fire safety monitoring systems","People":"Residents, building occupants, general public","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, building management, government"}]}
